caption: This was the best fried ribs and coconut scallops I’ve ever had. Super friendly and attentive to making sure our order was perfect! ❤️❤️❤️

I am amazed of the customer service for this company, my food was amazing. And the driver forgot my yams and before I even complained they came back to my house to deliver it. The best soul food you will find in my area and the collard greens are just to die for. If your in the area this is a MUST HAVE!

I had Lush Treatz for the first time tonight. The food tasted good, especially the Hennessy pineapple cake. Sarah has friendly service and my order was perfect. I think I’ll go back to try the smoothies.
